Templates for visual
Templates for visual
are readyâ€“made sets of interface elements that can be applied to an object profile as an initial setting of the visual. When further configuring the visual, the added set of elements can be changed or supplemented with the necessary elements.
Types of templates
Templates for visuals are presented on the "Templates" tab of the Elements panel, the template display includes the name of the template and its thumbnail.
When setting up a visual, the user can use both a system template and create their own. It is recommended to create your own template if there is a typical layout that needs to be applied to profiles of different object types.
The list of system templates offers a choice of the following layout options:
2 rows + 2 columns;
header + tab group;
with panel on the right;
with status bar.
The number of system templates may vary depending on the increase in System functionality.
Creating custom template
To create your own template, follow the sequence of steps:
1. customize the visual, the template of which needs to be created. It is important to keep in mind that the layout of the current visual will be saved in the template: groups, panels, widgets. Attributes and other settings (for example,
visual algorithms
) are not saved to the template.
2. On the "Templates" tab in the "Custom" section, click the add button, which is always located in place of the first template.
3. In the modal window that opens, customize the template by adding:
the name of the template, the field can be filled in automatically;
the image of the template thumbnail, the acceptable format of uploaded files: JPEG, JPG and PNG.
The uploaded image will be displayed under the template settings:
If the image has not been uploaded, after saving the template, the thumbnail will look as shown below:
4. Save the specified template settings
The created template will be saved on the "Templates" tab in the "Custom" section.
Editing the template
When hovering the mouse over the template thumbnail, a hover will appear in the upper right corner to edit the template or delete it. Clicking on the edit icon opens a window with the ability to change the name or thumbnail of the template. It is not possible to edit the visual in the template, to save the changed visual, a new template must be saved.
Applying the template
It is not possible to insert a template as part of the customized visual, the template is applied to the entire visual.
If the template is selected, the visual will be cleared and replaced with the template.
To apply the template to the object profile, click on the selected template.
Then the system will display the following notification:
By clicking "No" the visual will not be changed, by clicking "Yes" the current visual will be replaced by a set of template elements.
